name: Project Fps
description:
Project Fps - is a FPS game. That is everything I decided to do on April 17th 2020. It will be made on Unity. Why made? Because I didn't make games before. Yeah, it will be my first game, also first 3d game I ever made. I have tones of motivation. And this project will be finished. Also I never learned C# so it will be TWICE interesting to make this game. Current state: Alpha. Devs:1. Hours of making it a day: idk lol.

@Piece Crap Studio

https://discord.gg/2Qj7ewk
